column5: Has anyone ever fished any of the lakes north of the town of Grahm? I was wondering how the fishing was on Pakashkan, Harmon, Sparkling, ect... or any of the smaller lakes in this area. Any info would be greatly appreciated.

years ago I fished a little lake in that area, the water was crystal clear and the fishing was poor. the only thing in this lake is pike and the fellow I was fishing with had a tent camp on the lake. He told me the biggest pike he ever caught was a 5 pounder. Sorry I don't know the name of the lake but it was just off the rail line.
